name: Dance Man (AndrewBrownGames)
description:
Dance Man features all you ever wanted in a game: sex and dance. You play the villain, an ugly hairy man who disrupts a broadway musical.

  • Entry for Ludum Dare 25, created in 48 hours.
  • Ranked #7 out of 1327 entries in humor category.

What others are saying about Dance Man:

“LOL what the fuck did I just play?” -George Broussard, Creator of the Duke Nukem series.
“If there should ever be someone telling me that games are not art, I’ll show him this.” -timtipgames
“best trip I ever had playing a game.” -ddionisio “A surreal wonder.” -vrav
